attributes.action: Make all school in the uk a 3 day week.
attributes.additional_details:
parents have to wake up at six am to get their children to or ready for school, and keep in mind that some parents go to work as well, getting just a few hours of sleep to take their children to school. And have to spend all their hard earned money on gas for their car because some live far away form the school. Or a lot of money for busses each year. (WE’RE KNACKERED) Please give us an easier week 😭. 

It’s not just adults. Teachers and students to.  They get stressed with such a long week ahead. With essays and test to leave some students crying from the amount of pressure.
Please do this. Not for yourself, but for your people.
attributes.background: parents have to wake up at six am to get their kids to school. keep in mind, some parents go to work as well, getting little to no sleep to take their children to school. & have to spend all their money on gas for their car cause some live far form the school. & loads of money for a bus each year.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open which you might like to sign:

Limit the school week to three days
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622030
